FROM EMS_PUTREC_ACMP_FORM_DT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON B.ATTR_VALUE = A.ACMP_FORM_TYPECD AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='ACMP_FORM_TYPECD' WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{seqNo} AND A.CHG_TMS_CNT = #{chgTmsCnt}
